ComicInfo.Summary:
Denis may have been mostly accepted by the strange citizens of Nowhere, but he's not the only stranger wreaking havoc in town. When Denis gets enlisted to help with the investigation, his time in Nowhere is about to get weirder than he could ever imagine.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Main Cover | Tyler Jenkins (a) & Hilary Jenkins (c) | 1 | | B | Variant Cover | Martin Morazzo (a) & Chris O'Halloran (c) | 2 | | C | Unlocked Retailer Variant Cover | Gabriel Hernandez Walta | 3 |
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chris O'Halloran,Gabriel Hernandez Walta,Hilary Jenkins,Martin Morazzo,Tyler Jenkins
